name: Insert Name Here (Synaks)
description:
INSERT NAME HERE is a pixel art racing game designed to offer a fun experience while racing prototype cars across a variety of tracks. Currently the only track in the game is the Mount Panorama Circuit. More circuits will be added once all of the games planned features have been implemented.  Please Suggest a name!

Current Features:

-4 car races against the AI

-Dynamic Handling Model

-Time Trial Mode

-AI difficulty Adjustment

-AI Reacts to the player and other AI in a way that avoids massive incidents

-One car and one track

Planned features:

-12 car races against the AI

-Tire heating, cooling, and wear

-Fuel system

-Pit Stops

-Many General AI improvements

-Damage Model?(Quite Lenient if implemented)

-Many Cars and Tracks from around the world
